title: Tesla's boss is away. Time for the competition to play.
description:
Elon Musk’s purchase of Twitter may offer a chance for Tesla’s competitors to get some oxygen in the EV marketplace. Recode deputy editor Adam Clark Estes (@adamclarkestes) explains.

Read Adam’s article: http://link.recode.net/public/27517108

Today’s episode was produced and engineered by Jon Ehrens and hosted by Rani Molla.

Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
